speaker: agent
text: Thank you for calling [ORGANIZATION].

speaker: agent
text: If you are a current [ORGANIZATION] customer, please press [PHONE_NUMBER].

speaker: customer
text: If you are interested in obtaining a quote.

speaker: agent
text: Thanks for calling [ORGANIZATION] where you are in good hands.

speaker: agent
text: This call may be monitored or recorded for quality assurance purposes using your keypad.

speaker: agent
text: Please choose one of these options.

speaker: agent
text: If you're calling for auto insurance, press [PHONE_NUMBER].

speaker: agent
text: For homeowners insurance, press [PHONE_NUMBER], and for all other insurance, press [PHONE_NUMBER].

speaker: agent
text: If you would like to hear these choices again, press [PHONE_NUMBER].

speaker: customer
text: Sorry, I didn't hear anything.

speaker: agent
text: One more time.

speaker: agent
text: If you're calling for auto insurance, press [PHONE_NUMBER].

speaker: agent
text: For homeowners insurance, please enter the zip code where you need coverage.

speaker: agent
text: If we can help you with quotes for insurance today, please know that we may need to gather information from other sources, such as driving records or credit reports for you or other members of your household.

speaker: agent
text: By requesting these quotes, you authorize the sharing of information among affiliates of [ORGANIZATION] [ORGANIZATION] [ORGANIZATION] so we can offer you additional insurance policy options to consider that will help meet the protection needs of your entire household.

speaker: agent
text: Please know that [ORGANIZATION] takes your privacy seriously and we have a detailed policy on how we treat your personal information.

speaker: agent
text: As permitted by law, this and any subsequently collected information may be shared with outside parties who perform services on [ORGANIZATION] behalf without your authorization.

speaker: agent
text: You have the right to access or correct this information.

speaker: agent
text: If you want to see our privacy statement, let us know or visit [URL] thank you for calling [ORGANIZATION], where you are in good hands.

speaker: agent
text: My name is [PERSON_NAME], who I have the pleasure of speaking with today.

speaker: customer
text: Hello, can you hear me?

speaker: agent
text: It appears we have a bad connection and I am unable to hear you.

speaker: customer
text: I apologize for the inconvenience.

speaker: agent
text: I am still unable to hear you.

speaker: customer
text: I am so sorry.

speaker: customer
text: I cannot hear you and I understand this may be frustrating, but I will need to disconnect this call.

speaker: agent
text: Please call us back at [PHONE_NUMBER].

speaker: agent
text: Thank you for calling [ORGANIZATION].

speaker: customer
text: Goodbye.
